price: shakkiin hinjiru isaan Aakiraatti  isaanumatu hoonga’oota.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
